full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DHARM'A RAKshI TAS AA TI SHA LA GNANG BA'I BLO SBYONG MTSON CHA'I 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA MCHAN DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(DE LTAR BLO SKYONG MTSON CHA'I 'KHOR LO'I MCHAN 'GREL 'DI LA MDZAD BYANG MI 'DUG KYANG, MKHAS PA TSAD LDAN GYI GSUNG DU SNANG BAS, SNGON GUNG THANG RIN PO LA HAL HA'I GRVA PA ZHIG GIS BLO SBYONG 'DI LA @010B 'GREL PA RTZOM DU BCU GNAS MA DPE 'KHYER BZHIN SONG BA DE BLA BRANG PHYOGS NAS SNGA PHYIR RTZAR GCOD BGYID MUR YOD PA NI 'DI 'DRA AE YIN, ,MIN NA 'GREL PA DE DA LTA 'JA' LUS SU SONG LAS CHE SNYAM MO, ,MCHAN 'GREL 'DI NYI AAR HOR CHEN SBAR MA'I BLO SBYONG BRGYA RTZA'I GRAS SU BZHUGS YOD KYANG, 'JUG MTSAMS DGUGS SHING YIG NOR GYI PHUNG POR BSGRUBS GSHIS, ,MKHAS BLUN SU LA YANG PHAN THOGS MI NUS PAR SONG BA LA, BDAG GI BLA MA BKRAS 'KHYIL RDO RAMS PA ZHIG GIS, ,NGED KYIS LUNG NOD SKABS BLA MA'I ZHAL NAS MCHAN 'GREL 'DI LA ZHUS DAG PHYER BA GCIG BYUNG NA BSTAN PA LA BYA BA KHYAD PAR CAN GCIG BYAS PAR 'GYUR RGYU YIN ZHES BKA' PHEBS BYUNG BAS, ,KHYOD RANG NAS AE THUB LTOS DANG ZHES PHYAG DPE GNANG BAR BRTEN, ,KHO BOS NYIN MTSAN KHA SHAS SU RANG BLOS GANG SPOBS KYIS ZHU GTUGS ZHIB SMIN GYIS DAG PAR SGRUBS TE PHUL BAS, BLA MA NYID NAS DGYES TSOR DPE MED KYIS LUNG BSHAD STZAL ZHING, DED KYIS BKRAS 'KHYIL DU PHYIN TSE BLA MA LA SPYAN 'BEBS ZHU RGYU YIN ZHES PHYAG DPE BSNAMS TE PHEBS SO, ,RGYU DES DPE RGYUN DANG 'PHRIN LAS SPEL BA'I PHYIR SPAR DU BZHENGS PAR BYA BA'I BSAM PAS, ,PHYAG DPE NAS ZHAL BSHUS KYIS BLANGS PA 'DI LAGS SO,, ,,)
